entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or rain ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
